title: An idea for Riot and possible bug
body:
Okay so two things i want to mention
One is, i'm sure a lot of people would appreciate this too. I think it would be a great idea if Riot could create a ping meter on the UI somewhere before we join up for queues. I find it so inconvenient that I have no idea how my ping is until i'm already in a game. At the moment the only way that i know of to test this is to create a bot game first and that is a huge hassle. therefore i rarely do it.
This ping meter can improve the quality of our games and save us from a lot of trouble.

Two. i recently have been really into playing lulu and fiddle but i've noticed lulu's hex and fiddle's fear doesn't always completely CC champions.
I've played in many games where I run in and hex an enemy then a giant rocket still flies out while they are in cupcake form. Same thing with fiddle's fear.
Is this a bug or am i missing something?
